game.name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 마스터 치프의 상징적인 여정이 담긴 여섯 편의 Halo 게임을 하나로 묶어 PC용으로 제작했습니다. Halo의 오래된 팬이건 처음으로 스파르탄 117을 만나는 사람이건, Master Chief 컬렉션은 Halo 게임 경험의 완성판이 될 것입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Master Chief’s iconic journey includes six games, built for PC and collected in a single integrated experience. Whether you’re a long-time fan or meeting Spartan 117 for the first time, The Master Chief Collection is the definitive Halo gaming experience.
game.developers: 343 Industries, Splash Damage, Ruffian Games, Bungie, Saber Interactive
